text: Gérard Lorgeoux (born August 21, 1943 in Plumelin) is a member of the National Assembly of France. He represents the Morbihan department, and is a member of the Union for a Popular Movement. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:People from Morbihan Category:Politicians from Brittany Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Gérard Lorgeoux
